messages.content: I am proud to be standing as Labour’s candidate in Hertsmere. I have served my country in the police and the RAF and now my wish is to serve the people of Hertsmere as your MP.

messages.title: The choice this June is clear:
messages.content:
Between May's mandate for a hard Brexit, or a pragmatic negotiation with our European neighbours.
Between cuts that hit you and your family, or a fair deal and a higher minimum wage.
Between rising class sizes and cash-strapped schools, or a fully funded education sector.
Between a continued crisis in the NHS or a joined up health and care service which gives equal priority to mental health.
Between a regressive, ruthless Conservative government, or a progressive Labour government.

issues.brexitEurope: Between May's mandate for a hard Brexit, or a pragmatic negotiation with our European neighbours.
issues.economy: Between cuts that hit you and your family, or a fair deal and a higher minimum wage.
issues.education: Between rising class sizes and cash-strapped schools, or a fully funded education sector.
issues.health: Between a continued crisis in the NHS or a joined up health and care service which gives equal priority to mental health.

images.caption: Image of Candidate Fiona Smith on a Labour Party leaflet.
